group_1.textRight: Here we are, Takarazaki City♪

group_1.textLeft: This is where some former bigshot from the@Wings of Magius is living, yeah?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...

group_1.textLeft: Level with me, what's she like?

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: We could become best buds, y'know?@I wanna hear more about her.

group_1.textRight: Could she have been one of the key figures@of the Wings of Magius, perhaps?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...
At headquarters, she was only second to Mifuyu...
She was an instructor for Magical Girls...

group_1.textRight: The Neo-Magius is disbanded now, but...
If she had been with us, maybe we could have@prevented that from happening...

group_1.textLeft: That much clout, huh?
How come she didn't take over?

group_1.textRight: She said she'll only work under someone@she has faith in...

group_1.textLeft: She won't lead others?

group_1.textRight: According to her, she's better suited to be@an assistant.
But, she won't help unless it's someone she's@willing to work under...
When we tried to invite her, she turned us away...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that's right...
Hmmm...
So now that a cutie like me is taking the lead...
We've got a shot at it.
Now that's what I'd call a "golden opportunity"★

group_1.textRight: But, it's not going to be easy...

group_1.textLeft: No worries!
We're all set as long as the instructor likes@cute lil' me, yeah?

group_1.textRight: Are you sure it'll be okay?

group_1.textLeft: Yup!

group_1.textRight: But, I haven't even recognized you as our@leader yet...

group_1.textLeft: You're gonna make me cry, y'know!
So cold, Shigurin! Even though we cuties are@birds of a feather.

group_1.textRight: Eh, me...and you...?
We're not alike at all. I wish you'd go away...

group_1.textLeft: But you can't win over this instructor without me,@right?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, but...
It's no use, Shigure. We can't do anything on@our own, anyway.
Let's just think of this as fate and try to@work together.

group_1.textLeft: If you say so, Hagumun...
So sorry.[chara:102801:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102801:motion_100][chara:102801:cheek_0][chara:102801:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:102801:lipSynch_1] But, thankies★

group_1.textRight: That's not something that deserves thanks...

group_1.textLeft: I just wanna thank you two for making peace,@y'know?

group_1.textRight: *Giggle*♪

group_1.textLeft: Sooo, what's the name of this girl we're meeting?

group_1.textRight: Oh, umm...
Chief instructor of Hotel Fendt Hope,@[textRed:San Kagura].
And her secret weapon, [textRed:Miyuri Yukari].

group_1.textLeft: Two people?

group_1.textRight: Miyuri is another one of the instructor's weapons.

group_1.textLeft: Sounds like she's packing some serious punch!@I can't wait to meet her★
